archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Create an Azure Kubernetes cluster (AKS)
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: In this task, we will create an Azure Kubernetes Service cluster. From the Azure Portal, select + Create a resource, Containers and select Kubernetes Service. In the Basics blade provide the information as below: Subscription: Choose the required subscription Resource group: Select the appropriate resource group Name: NexSys Region: Choose the same region as the resource group Kubernetes version: 1.15.1 (default). Cluster Name: NexSysAKSCluster01 DNS Name Prefix: NexSys Under Node size, click “Change size” to configure your VM size. Search and select “DS2_v2”. Set the Node Count to 1 Click “Next: Authentication“
